text: The Battle of Kerzhenets () is a 1971 Soviet animated movie directed by Ivan Ivanov-Vano and Yuri Norstein.Мультфильмы Александра Петрова вошли в сотню лучших по РоссииСеча при Керженце == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1971 movies Category:1970s animated movies Category:Soviet animated movies Category:Movies directed by Ivan Ivanov-Vano Category:Movies directed by Yuri Norstein
title: The Battle of Kerzhenets
